meeting_info.organization: Dallas Mall Area Redevelopment TIF District Board of Directors
meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6DN Conference Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Call to order and introduction of meeting participants.
Public comments pertaining to agenda item 3 through 4.
Review and consideration of the Meeting Record of the January 22, 2024 Mall Area Redevelopment TIF District Board Meeting.
Review and consideration of a fourth amendment to the Tax Increment Development, Chapter 380 Grant, and Chapter 380 Loan Agreement.
agenda_items.description: Amendments related to the Reimagine RedBird Mall Redevelopment Project, including changes to investment requirements and occupancy standards.
agenda_items.action_required: Approval and forward a recommendation of approval to City Council
